name: Velocity Noodle
description:
Time to deliver noodles! In the world of Velocity Noodle, food delivery is more critical than ever, and it's up to you to beat the challenging routes in a futuristic pixel city. Run, jump, teleport, and slide to deliver your noodles in record time. Velocity Noodle is a 2D, precision platformer that makes you feel like a speedrunner when you try different techniques to figure out the best path and beat record times.

  • 60+ levels with several challenging post-game levels
  • Banging synthwave soundtrack
  • Hours of git gud fun
  • Become a speedrunner and learn to break records


Velocity Noodle has ultra-smooth movement with different techniques that let you go faster. With a base set of movement skills, you learn to combo them together to break levels and go even quicker.

It's easy to understand, and soon you'll feel like a speedrunner when you try out different moves in different levels. There's even more to discover for speedrunners when combining different jumps and teleportation to reach new speeds.


You'll have to run through several handcrafted challenging levels for all skill levels. The city has placed harsh restrictions on delivery companies. Thus your path is full of traps and alternative routes.

The more you unlock, and the more records you beat, the more challenging puzzles are presented to you. Levels also have secrets and collectibles for those who love exploring and breaking levels.


Play just for fun and your own satisfaction, or try to beat records times and collect all the shiny trophies. Beat enough levels, and you'll unlock expert versions with their own record and trophies that will really push you.


You can pet dog. That's all.
